title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a crocodile according to Ibn Sirin and leading scholars?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile: The crocodile is one of the largest animals, as it is distinguished by its wide body and walking on all fours. It is also known for its sharp teeth that kill prey. It is said by interpretation scholars, “This is how long it lasts.” Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile: Interpreters say that seeing a crocodile in a dream indicates exposure to many unpleasant things during this period. And when the dreamer sees in a dream a huge crocodile attacking him, This means that he is suffering from distress, severe sadness, or illness. Also, if the dreamer sees a large crocodile in the sea in a dream, it means that he is walking on the wrong path and committing many sins and disobedience, and he must repent to God. As for seeing a crocodile in a dream, it indicates the betrayal of those closest to him. Many claim that seeing a crocodile in a dream indicates debauchery and debauchery committed by the dreamer. Seeing crocodiles in a dream means that you are suffering from grief, severe sadness, severe financial crises, or the short life that the dreamer will lead. If a girl sees a crocodile in a dream, this symbolizes the presence of a number There are many haters and envious people, and she must beware of them. Al-Nabulsi, may God have mercy on him, believes that seeing a crocodile in a dream indicates committing immoral acts and major sins. Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing a crocodile in a dream indicates policemen who are chasing the dreamer and suffering from serious injustice. If the dreamer sees a crocodile in the sea in a dream, this means that she will suffer from many family problems and many obstacles in her life. As for seeing a crocodile in a dream, it indicates a deterioration in his health condition and severe fatigue, and it may lead to death. And the dreamer who sees a huge crocodile in a dream means that Someone is chasing him and wants to get involved with her. Also, seeing a crocodile on the ground in a dream indicates the presence of a cunning enemy and one must beware of him. Interpretation of a dream about crocodileIf an unmarried girl sees a crocodile in a dream, this means a great betrayal that she will be exposed to by her relatives. In the event that The fortuneteller saw in a dream that a crocodile was approaching it, then it symbolizes exposure to problems and great sadness in the coming period. As for the dreamer who sees in a dream that the crocodile is trying to prey on him and escape from it, this indicates his distance from evil people who want to fall into the circle of evil. Seeing a dreamer eating meat A raw crocodile in a dream means that you overcome enemies and harm them. Also, seeing a girl eating crocodile meat in a dream means that you will obtain a high position and get a good job. As for the dreamer who sees a small crocodile in a dream, this indicates extreme tension at that time and taking... Many wrong decisions. And if the dreamer sees her raising a crocodile in a dream, this means that she will get a good job and will have a wonderful relationship. If the dreamer sees the crocodile inside her house, this means that she will be exposed to some matters beyond her control. Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile for a married woman. Interpreters believe For a married woman to see a crocodile in a dream means that she will be exposed to many problems and disagreements in her life. Also

title: Signs of twin pregnancy in a dream 2021

preview.html: Signs of pregnancy with twins in a dream: You are pregnant, two words that can send a lady to the seventh heaven, two words that make her prepare for motherhood that she dreamed of and that was in her instinct since childhood, and finally her little game that she used to play. Her childhood will come true and bring the pulse into her hands, and at this point she will begin a beautiful journey of preparation to welcome this beautiful child and become pregnant with a fetus that is enough to make a woman happy, so what if she is? twins? The world will not be filled with joy as a whole, and in the world of dreams there are some dreams that we see that may be a sign that a woman is carrying two small children in her womb. Various We will find signs of pregnancy with twins in a dream. Dreams that indicate that a woman is pregnant: Before the woman knows the news of her pregnancy, she may In her dreams, she sees certain dreams that carry a beautiful sign that tells her that she is pregnant, so we will learn the following about dreams that tell a woman that she is pregnant: If a woman sees herself picking kiwi fruit in her dream, this is good news for her that she will become pregnant. A flying white angel in a dream indicates good news. If a married woman dreams of a cat hanging on her clothes, this is a sign that she will soon give birth to good offspring. Seeing a lot of disturbing and chaotic dreams with unexpected events indicates that the woman’s hormones are disturbed due to pregnancy, so these dreams can be a sign of pregnancy. If a married woman sees herself emptying a piece of meat in her dream, this means that she is pregnant. The road that divides while walking on it in her dream can also bring pregnancy. If she sees a lot of milk coming out of her husband, this indicates that she is pregnant with a male child, and God knows best. Seeing a sheep in a dream is a sign. On pregnancy: If a married woman sees that she is buying gold, this means that she is pregnant with a boy, while buying silver indicates that she is pregnant with a girl. Among the dreams that indicate pregnancy is that she also sees menstruation. Seeing eggs in large quantities indicates the imminent pregnancy of the dreamer. Seeing prophets and messengers is among the dreams that indicate Upcoming pregnancyIf she has children and sees in her dream someone showing a new tooth, this is a sign that God will give birth to a new child for her. Other signs that a married woman is about to become pregnant: A married woman who sees herself wearing a white crown indicates that she will become pregnant. A drop of water is falling From the sky is a sign of pregnancy. Seeing herself laughing in a dream is one of the signs of approaching pregnancy. Going to buy perfumes in a dream is one of the signs of approaching pregnancy and it is likely to be female. If she sees in her dream a woman who knows that she is giving birth, this is good news for her that she will become pregnant. Carrying a bag full of water is a sign On pregnancy: The divorce of a married woman from her husband in a dream is also a sign of pregnancy. Coins and banknotes in a dream mean pregnancy. Eating dates in a dream is good news about pregnancy. Milk coming out of her breast in a dream is a sign that she will become pregnant with a male child, and God knows best. Also, seeing a date in a married woman’s dream From Ola

title: The 7 most famous interpretations of seeing the muezzin in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing the muezzin in the street? Evidence of good and forbidding evil. What does it mean for a person to see that he is a muezzin and authorized to lead the prayer? It indicates that he is a righteous person. What is the interpretation of seeing the call to prayer without anyone noticing it? Evidence of the presence of oppressors in his life. Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer without anyone noticing it? Evidence of the presence of oppressors in his life. Interpretation of seeing The muezzin in a man’s dream? Evidence of polygamy. What is the interpretation of seeing the call outside its time? Evidence of the spread of ignorance. Interpretation of a dream of a muezzin by Ibn Sirin. If a person sees in his dream that he has become a muezzin and is authorized to lead the prayer, this means that he has rights. Seeing a person in a dream That he calls the prayer to prayer through a hole or a well, this is evidence that he is calling people to travel to a far away place. Then if one sees in a dream that he has become a muezzin while in reality he is not a muezzin, then he will be one of the sons of the state. Then seeing the muezzin in the street is evidence of enjoining good and forbidding. About evil. The dream of the Nabulsi muezzin. If one sees in a dream that he has placed an ear on the roof of a friend, this will be a sign of betrayal between them. Then seeing the muezzin calling the prayer in the dream without anyone noticing him, and this is evidence of the presence of oppressors in his life. So seeing the muezzin in the bathroom An unpleasant vision. If one sees in a dream the muezzin calling for entertainment and play, this is a sign of the illness that the fortuneteller will suffer from. Interpretation of a dream about a muezzin for a man. Seeing a muezzin in a man’s dream is evidence that he is a man of multiple marriages. Seeing a muezzin in a dream may indicate Hajj. Then if he sees A woman giving the call to prayer in the mosque is evidence of the spread of sects. Then seeing that he heard the call at an inappropriate time is evidence of the spread of ignorance. The muezzin’s dream about a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she hears the muezzin’s voice and gets angry with him, this means that in her life there are people who wish her harm and are conspiring against her. Then, if she sees the muezzin giving the call to prayer in a closed place or a well, this indicates her fear of traveling and changing her life. Interpretation of a dream about a muezzin for a single woman. If an unmarried woman hears the muezzin in a dream and begins to perform the prayer, this is evidence that she will soon be blessed with Hajj. Then it is seen that the voice of the muezzin has It was heard, and it was beautiful and clear, it means an abundance of supply. Then seeing the muezzin in a dream may indicate marriage soon. The muezzin’s dream of a pregnant woman. The muezzin’s call to prayer in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of sustenance and many goods that she will receive. So, hearing the muezzin’s voice in a dream Evidence of the presence of a male child that she will give birth to soon. Then the muezzin in the dream can be evidence of good offspring for the pregnant woman.

title: Interpretation of condolences in a dream - seeing condolences in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams for condolencesInterpretation of seeing her crying with hot tears and condolences in a dreamCondolences in a dream: For someone who remains in good condition, it is evidence that something bad has happened, and for the suffering person, this is a sign of benefit. As for the senders and those who hope for money, this is evidence of their need for people to relieve them of the misfortunes and harm that befell them. Consolation in distress indicates hope, kindness, and the disappearance of distress. Whoever dreams of consoling an injured person will receive reassurance or good news, and consoling someone without an injured person in a dream indicates the occurrence of an accident that calls for condolence. Perhaps consolation suggests coming to terms with one’s inadequacy and attracting people to honesty and tenderness in speech. Interpretation of seeing condolences. In a dream, if an unmarried girl sees a funeral in her dream, this indicates the approaching date of that girl’s marriage if she is engaged, or an indication of the emergence of happy news for that girl. And if a girl sees that she is consoling a man in her dream, this is evidence that she will marry that man or that he There may be interaction between them in the future at work or anywhere, but this interaction indicates kindness. Condolences in a married woman’s dream indicate her new pregnancy or evidence of good news in that woman’s life. Perhaps seeing comfort in a married woman’s dream indicates the presence of new friendships for her in life. Seeing comfort in a married woman’s dream may indicate that the woman marries one of her children if they are at an early stage, or evidence of her children’s success in studies and excellence. If a divorced woman sees comfort In a dream, this means that this divorced woman is now living a better life emotionally, socially, and financially. Comfort in a widow’s dream is a good omen that this woman will overcome her sorrows and God Almighty will help her pass this crisis in peace. Whoever sees that she is accepting the condolences of her deceased husband, this is evidence that this The woman will marry again, or she is waiting for a pleasant event in her life that will eliminate worry and sadness in this woman’s life. If a pregnant woman sees comfort in her dream, this means that she will get rid of the problems of pregnancy and childbirth. Comforting a pregnant woman in a dream also indicates that God will fulfill her desire. In procreation.Condolences in a man’s dream, in general, indicate his illustrious position among men. Consolation in the dream of an unmarried young man indicates the date of his marriage. Illness. Condolences may indicate a positive change in the life of the person with this vision, as he may have a lot of money in the coming period, or a new baby, or other things that change the course of life. If the condolence is in a dream without tears, then it is a sign of good luck for the person with this vision. And whoever witnesses his wife’s consolation, he will do better than his wife and console him without tears. The dream indicates joys, engagement, marriage, or the like. If the funeral comes in a dream and is accompanied by crying, this indicates instability in the dreamer’s life, as it indicates a major failure in study, work, or the like. Condolences in a dream accompanied by crying in A married woman’s dream may indicate her divorce from her husband, or many problems may arise between her and her husband, and it may indicate the emergence of some problems on her behalf.

title: A detailed interpretation of an eagle in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we present to you the interpretation of an eagle in a dream and its meaning in detail. The world of dreams is one of the things that arouses a person’s curiosity to locate dream symbols in reality related to important events in his life, whether happy or sad, and among the common dreams that we dream of in a dream is the dream of birds of all kinds. Among these birds that may come to us in a dream is the eagle, which is one of the most important types of birds of prey, and is distinguished by its ability to fly high in the sky over long distances, in addition to the strength of its claws. For what he uses it to catch his food, but what about its symbols and guides for the dreamer in reality? We will answer this in an encyclopedia in which we learn about the opinion of interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin regarding the interpretation of this dream. Interpretation of an eagle in a dream. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing an eagle in a dream. Ibn Sirin mentioned many interpretations of this dream, as it indicates the acquisition of great status or great wealth, and this dream indicates Also to the dreamer's long life. If the dreamer sees an eagle on a mountain or in a tree, then this vision indicates goodness and happiness for him. But if an eagle is seen in broad daylight, this vision is far-fetched and indicates that the dreamer will be sick, and God knows best. If you see yourself being killed An eagle in a dream, it means that you will get a lot of money. If the dreamer sees an eagle flying in the sky, this vision symbolizes the success and superiority that the dreamer was able to achieve in reality. In the event that you see an eagle flying low in the sky, this vision reflects The dreamer failed to achieve what he wanted. Among the interpretations mentioned by Ibn Sirin in this dream is that in the case of eating eagle meat, this vision indicates the acquisition of money. Seeing a black eagle in a dream: If you see a black eagle in a dream, this vision is repulsive and shows the dreamer’s worries and sorrows, and it It is an indication of the presence of an evil and unjust person in the dreamer’s life. Seeing this dream, especially for a man, indicates that he is suffering from poverty, and God knows best. As for the meaning of this dream in reality for a woman, it is an indication of her separation from the one she loves in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a white eagle in Dream: Contrary to interpretations of a dream about a black eagle, seeing a white eagle is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicates goodness, happiness, abundant living, and obtaining a job opportunity. Among the connotations of dreaming about a white eagle is that it shows the wisdom of the visionary and his ability to take advantage of opportunities. Interpretation of an eagle in a dream for a single woman: The dream of an eagle has many praiseworthy interpretations for single women because it indicates goodness and happiness for them. If you see the wings of an eagle in a dream, this dream indicates that you will get a lot of money. But if in a dream he sees an eagle feeding its young, then this vision is good news for marriage soon, and God I know. Seeing an eagle in a dream for a married woman. As for the meaning of this dream for a married woman, it is a sign of kindness and livelihood, as if she saw an eagle coming to her in a dream. One of the indicators of seeing an eagle in a dream is that it indicates success or an opportunity to travel in reality. If a woman sees an eagle coming to her in a dream.

But if in a dream he sees an eagle feeding its young, then this vision is good news for marriage soon, and God I know. Seeing an eagle in a dream for a married woman. As for the meaning of this dream for a married woman, it is a sign of kindness and livelihood, as if she saw an eagle coming to her in a dream. One of the indicators of seeing an eagle in a dream is that it indicates success or an opportunity to travel in reality. If a woman sees an eagle coming to her in a dream.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing riding a bus in a dream for a married woman?

preview.html: Whether the bus is moving fast or slow, and whether the bus is white or a different color, we will answer all of these questions through this article from your website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing riding a bus in a dream for a single girl. When a single girl sees herself driving a bus in a dream. It is a state of emotional stability that you are in reality. But if he is driving the bus with passengers in the dream with the unmarried girl. The vision may indicate that he will lead things or that he is a strong personality who controls all matters. If the unmarried girl sees that she is riding a bus and there is Passengers she did not know and she was happy about that in the dream. The vision indicated that she would hear a lot of good news, especially if she was engaged, because she would hear the events that made her happy, thanks to God Almighty. But if she saw that she was riding the bus without passengers, or that she was driving it alone, and it was not Someone is with her in a dream. She is exposed to some feelings of loneliness due to some wrong decisions that she actually makes. If you are driving a bus and the driver is driving at a high speed in an unmarried girl’s dream. It is a sign of some situations in some matters related to her personal life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. That is, it is one of those dreams that usually comes with a lot of promises and conveys messages that are not It contains a lot of goodness, praise be to God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing a bus trip with family and friends in a married woman’s dream. This means that she cares a lot about matters related to the family and parents, especially if it is her husband’s family. But if he sees that he is driving the bus and walking quickly in a dream with a married woman They are wrong decisions, and events may not be in their favor, and God Almighty is high. In the event that a married woman dreams that she is riding with a stranger who is driving the bus at crazy speed. That is, she is subject to the words of someone who wants to destroy her house, and God knows best. And in another interpretation of seeing riding the bus in... A dream of a married woman. She will go through many difficult stages in her life. Interpretation of seeing a bus in a dream for a man and its meaning. Driving a bus in a married man’s dream is one of the most promising dreams for a man, especially if he is married. Because it is one of the dreams that means moving from one state to another. It indicates that he is a person who loves isolation and retreating behind negative opinions, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Whereas if a married man sees in a dream He rides the bus calmly and wisely. He is a person who is honest and wise in his relationships with people. Seeing him riding the bus with people who are in conflict with them in reality can be interpreted and seeing them in a dream about the bus in a dream with a married man. title: The 11 most popular interpretations of seeing sweat in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing sweat in a dream? It indicates the harm that the dreamer has suffered in the world. What does it mean to see sweat coming out of the armpit? The elements of hypocrisy and hypocrisy among people. What is the interpretation of seeing sweat related to blood? Evidence of forbidden money. What does it mean to see sweat coming out of The body? Evidence of the death of a family member. What is the interpretation of a girl who saw sweat coming out of her body and felt great relief? It indicates the fulfillment of needs and the repayment of all debts. Interpretation of a dream about a tribe by Ibn Sirin. Seeing sweat in a dream indicates the harm that the dreamer is exposed to in this world. Then whoever sees in a dream that he is sweating, all his needs will be met. The sweat that comes out of the armpit in a dream can indicate hypocrisy and hypocrisy among people. Then hot sweat in a dream indicates a long life. Cold sweat in a dream can be a sign of... Death. After that, seeing sweat accompanied by blood in a dream is evidence of wasting money. Interpretation of a dream about sweat according to Al-Nabulsi. Sweat in a person’s dream is evidence of the good that will be on his way to him. And whoever sees that every sweat from his body is bleeding, this indicates fulfillment of debt and satisfaction of needs. Getting rid of sweat from the body after it comes out is a sign of getting rid of worries and problems. So, seeing sweat coming out of an animal is evidence of the problems that the dreamer is suffering from. The good smell of sweat in a dream is a sign of good health. Then the bad smell of sweat is evidence of bad things happening. In the life of a fortuneteller, whether a man or a woman. A dream about a man with sweat. The sweat that comes out of the dreamer’s body is evidence of getting rid of the problems and fears that this person suffers from. Seeing another person sweating is an indication that he will obtain a lot of money from this person and the benefit that he will receive. He reaps it from him. Then to dream of a man smelling sweat is a sign of kindness and nourishment. Seeing sweat coming out of the armpits and smelling bad, this indicates a bad situation that the dreamer will be in. Sweat coming out of the body can indicate the death of a family member. Interpretation of a dream about sweat for a woman Married: Introducing a married woman in her dream could be a sign of salvation from the problems and worries that arise between her and her husband. If a married woman has a bad smell of sweat, this indicates that she is doing many things that she does not like. Bad-smelling sweat can indicate the money she spends A woman on useless things. Interpretation of a dream about sweat for single women. If a girl sees sweat on her clothes, this means that she is saving money to buy valuable things. After that, after seeing the flow of sweat from the girl and she was suffering from an illness, she will soon be cured. If the girl sees sweat coming out of Her body felt comfortable, as this indicates that she fulfilled her needs and paid off all her debts.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a giraffe in a dream

preview.html: Today, dear reader, we present to you the interpretation of a dream about seeing a giraffe in a dream, or devouring meat, as it is a non-predatory animal, and therefore it is evidence of goodness and innocence. The giraffe is also considered a patient animal because of its ability to withstand thirst for long periods of time and because of the similarities There are many differences between them and camels, and they are called “tiger camels” because of their color. The tiger has the skin and characteristics of a camel. Despite the length of the giraffe, it is considered the tallest animal and is proud of its walking, but seeing it in a dream indicates kindness and humility. You should follow us in the encyclopedia.Interpretation of a dream about seeing a giraffe in a dream. Seeing him in a dream also shows correct thinking and insight into things. Seeing a giraffe in a dream indicates the fulfillment of aspirations and the fulfillment of desires, given the height and length of its neck. Interpretation of a dream about a giraffe chasing me. A giraffe is a sign of high status and whoever sees that The giraffe is chasing him in a dream, as this is an indication of the fulfillment of his ambitions and his high status. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a giraffe for a single girl: Seeing a single girl is evidence of the fulfillment of her desires, whether it is marriage to someone she loves, a dream job, or a trip she aspires to take, because the giraffe is known for running quickly on its long legs. She also shows that she is a serious and patient person with the right attitude by making her life decisions. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream slaughtering a giraffe, this is a sign that she will be forced to marry someone she does not want. Interpretation of a dream about a married giraffe. If a married woman sees that she sees a giraffe in the zoo in a dream This is good news that she will become pregnant. But if a married woman sees that she is accompanied by a giraffe, this indicates the strength of her personality and her success in her life with her husband, and she is able to solve her family’s problems. As for a married woman who sees that she is eating giraffe meat, this indicates that she is persecuting another woman, whether she is Her friend, sister, or maid. Seeing a giraffe in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees a giraffe in her dream, this is evidence that her due date is approaching, and it is considered good news for her that it will be easy and easy to give birth and give birth to a healthy male child. Strong will. Interpretation of a giraffe in a dream for a man. A man’s dream of a giraffe hugging him indicates that he will face many family problems. And if he sees in a dream that he is killing a giraffe, this is evidence that he has abandoned his prayers. If you dream of a giraffe approaching him and tilting its neck towards him, this is an indication that He is about to fulfill his dreams. The dream of a man who eats giraffe meat in a dream indicates his marriage to a woman of benefit, or to the owner of the shop, or the owner of the capital that he manages in trade. Only God knows the unseen and the hour. To learn more different interpretations of dreams, you need to enter the dream interpretation application of the encyclopedia.

title: Interpretation of seeing the number three in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the number three in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing the number three in a dream is generally considered a symbol of kindness and an indication that something good will happen in the dreamer’s life. If one sees the number 3 in his dream, this is evidence that he will be blessed with good and righteous offspring with him, God willing. The number 3 is a number Single indicates good luck and abundant livelihood for the visionary. Points of the number three in the dream that the viewer enjoys a state of financial stability. It also indicates that the dreamer will have a good wife to share his life with him. If the dreamer is a student in the study stage, then seeing the number 3 indicates his success and excellence, God willing. Interpretation of the number three in a dream for a single woman. Seeing the number three in a dream means being single in goodness, ample living, and stability in life. It also indicates the beginning of a new life for the girl, either through marriage soon or starting a new field of work. It also indicates the good fortune that accompanies the girl with the vision. In her life, as well as her good reputation in the world. Interpretation of a dream about the number 30 in a dream for a married woman. The number 30 appears in a dream for a married woman that she is living a happy life with her husband. This indicates that she will complete her married life happily and happily, God willing. The number three in the dreamer’s dream indicates polygamy. The offspring that this woman will have. But if the dreamer is suffering from some problems in her married life, she sees the number 30 in the vision. This is an unpleasant vision because it indicates a separation between her and her husband. Interpretation of the number 35 in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees the number three in her dream, this is a sign of goodness. And the large and spacious living that will come to the dreamer. And if the reason for the separation was dry treatment and humiliation, then seeing the number 35 in her dream indicates that she will communicate with a religious man with good morals. But if this woman wants to work and support herself, this is an indication that she will achieve great success and distinction. On a professional level. Dreaming of the number 33 in a dream about a pregnant woman. Seeing the number 33 in a dream means that she is pregnant for an easy birth, God willing. It indicates positive changes in her life after giving birth, and God knows best. It also indicates the broad diet that insight will follow in her life. Interpretation The number fifty-three in a dream for NabulusThe number fifty-three in a dream indicates a happy life and plenty of sustenance. This vision shows that the dreamer enjoys having loyal friends around him who wish him the best. It also indicates happy news that will reach the fortuneteller in the coming days. This vision shows that the divine is a personality He is mentally and intellectually balanced and deals with matters rationally and with mental soundness. This is one of the reasons for his success and stability in his professional and social life. Interpretation of three days in a dream: Seeing three days in a dream indicates the emergence of many positive changes that will significantly change the dreamer’s life for the better. This vision also indicates That the dreamer will get rid of his debts and improve his financial situation significantly. If he sees a free girl, this vision, being an indication of her imminent marriage to a good young man, God Almighty will take her into consideration.

This vision also indicates that the dreamer will get rid of his debts and improve his financial situation significantly. If a free girl sees this vision, being an indication of her imminent marriage to a righteous young man, God Almighty will take her in
